```{=html}
<style>
/* Notebook index grid */
  .notebook-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, minmax(0, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
    margin: 1.5rem 0 2rem;
  }

  @media (max-width: 1100px) {
    .notebook-grid {
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0, 1fr));
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 820px) {
    .notebook-grid {
      grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 540px) {
    .notebook-grid {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
  }

  main a.notebook-card {
    display: block;
    color: #0f1912;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  main a.notebook-card,
  main a.notebook-card:hover,
  main a.notebook-card:focus-visible,
  .notebook-card * {
    text-decoration: none !important;
  }

  .notebook-card__image-wrap {
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .notebook-card__image {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    aspect-ratio: 16 / 9;
    object-fit: cover;
    transition: opacity 160ms ease;
  }

  .notebook-card:hover .notebook-card__image,
  .notebook-card:focus-visible .notebook-card__image {
    opacity: 0.85;
  }

  .notebook-card__title {
    margin: 0.5rem 0 0;
    font-size: 1rem;
    line-height: 1.35;
    color: #111;
  }
</style>

<script>
  (async () => {
    const grid = document.getElementById("notebook-grid");

    try {
      const response = await fetch("notebooks.json");
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Unable to load notebook list.");

      const data = await response.json();
      const notebooks = (
        Array.isArray(data)
          ? data
          : Array.isArray(data?.notebooks)
          ? data.notebooks
          : []
      ).filter((nb) => !nb.hide);

      if (!notebooks.length) {
        grid.innerHTML = "<p>No notebooks found.</p>";
        return;
      }

      const cards = notebooks
        .map((nb) => {
          const image = nb.image || "images/default_crop.webp";
          const titleEn = (nb.title && nb.title.en) || nb.id || "Notebook";
          const href =
            typeof nb.path === "string"
              ? nb.path.replace(".qmd", ".html")
              : nb.path;

          return `
            <a class="notebook-card" href="${href}">
              <div class="notebook-card__image-wrap">
                <img class="notebook-card__image" src="${image}" alt="${titleEn}">
              </div>
              <h3 class="notebook-card__title">${titleEn}</h3>
            </a>
          `;
        })
        .join("");

      grid.innerHTML = cards;
    } catch (err) {
      grid.innerHTML = "<p>Error loading notebooks. Please try again later.</p>";
      console.error(err);
    }
  })();
</script>
```
